EmailTemplate.description: Hi Team, The Target account is Australia Post Load&Go Prepaid visa card ID: XXX The funds of $ did not reach the card and should be returned to your customers account. Or: The funds of $ reached the card on DDMMYYY HH:MM and $ was removed from the account via ATM. There is $ available for recall The card is registered although these details have not been verified: Name: XYZ Date of Birth: XYZ Phone Number: XYZ Suburb: XYZ OR The card is not registered however the following mobile number was provided at the time of purchase: XYZ Kind regards Cornelia Card Transactions Monitoring Shared Services Australia Post cardtransactionsmonitoring@auspost.com.au
EmailTemplate.name: Confirmed Fraud
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Fraud to Australia Post Prepaid Cards - 2000202099 , S-875732
